attributes.action: Thoroughly invisitgate the Prison system and make it work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Illegal drugs and alcohol are available within the Prison system, often to the knowledge of Prison staff.

A system needs to be put into place that brakes the drug cycle while offenders are 'inside'. 

A system that helps offenders to stop them re-offending while at the same time stops crime from continuing within the prison walls.
